TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Lalumaang, title = Lalumaang, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lalumaang} }

S.FORM: Lalumaang Itiniay i Xincheng Cen no Hualien ko Lalumaang a niyaro', 204 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 542 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 39% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 214 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 61% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 328 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 26%, Bunun 1%, Tayal 1%, Truku 7%, Kebalan 2%, Paiwan 1%, roma 2%.

Lalomaang Itiniay i Xincheng Cen no Hoalien ko Lalomaang a niyaro', 204 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 542 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 39% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 214 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 61% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 328 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 26%, Bonon 1%, Tayal 1%, Troko 7%, Kebalan 2%, Paiwan 1%, roma 2%.
